p:
Pneumocytes and epithelial syncytial cells are important targets of MERS-CoV. The lung tissue presents DAD. Severe peripheral vascular diseases, patchy cardiac fibrosis, and hepatic steatosis have also been found in other organs.
52 Another symptom is bronchial submucosal gland necrosis.
52 Renal biopsy may show acute tubulointerstitial nephritis and acute tubulosclerosis with protein casts.
22
